channel.title: My Goodbyes To You All
channel.description:
So This has been a mixed year. I first found Auxy in July of 2017, I had always wantes to create music but could never afford the software.
I remember this was when I was in Canada with some friends when I found the app and have been writing tracks on it ever since.
As some of you may know I have had bad times throughout the year (as most teenagers do it seems) music has been the perfect escape for me and to that I thank the developers for creating this.
Now i‚Äôm not going to pull a DJ_La_Rocca and write the entire bible as a goodbye so i‚Äôm going to keep it short as to why: This past year has been the perfect start to my music career but now I must say goodbye to the app and it‚Äôs community. All of you are so talented and I really wish everyone the best in your future of music.
I would like to thank: @xavior @HELIXX @anon86704580 @Matik @DJ_La_Rocca @Produk @blackocean @MrSerpent @Phluze @MR_ANDERSON You have all shown so much support to me and I have really enjoyed working alongside all of you. I wish you the best
Now by no means does this mean that I am quitting music, as DJ La Rocca put it ‚ÄúAuxy was limiting‚Äù or something along those lines. That is why I have moved towards Ableton which I am very privileged to have, and I have already started writing tracks on it.
As my final goodbye I have released my ‚Äú8 month in the making album‚Äù, Limitations And A Bad Case Of Perfectionism (Listen here) https://soundcloud.com/xiejramusic/sets/gtil729x76vx
So then I guess that‚Äôs it from me. Thank you everyone and stay tuned! üëã
~ Elliott Martin (AKA Xiejra)

item.title: My Goodbyes To You All
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
Although it would be interesting to hear if people who make the switch to a DAW like Ableton are able to develop their music and whether it leads to them actually not using Auxy anymore or whether it still works as a good song starter.

Read full topic

item.title: My Goodbyes To You All
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
We close Goodbye threads, because people kept posting them and then returning a few days later. Better to PM your mates.

Sorry to hear that you‚Äôre leaving. Hopefully you‚Äôll pop in occasionally.

I‚Äôm off to listen to your album now‚Ä¶

Read full topic

it‚Äôs probably in the updated Private Policy‚Ä¶

spoiler

Read full topic

item.title: My Goodbyes To You All
item.dc:creator: crystldawnmusic
item.description:
I‚Äôm still at a bit of a loss to as why people are leaving all of a sudden. I understand they are using different DAWs beaut is that a reason to leave the community? I also understand that the forum is geared towards Auxy, but there‚Äôs no hard-and-fast rule that people have to leave after the move on from primarily using the app.

Read full topic

item.title: My Goodbyes To You All
item.dc:creator: Matik
item.description:
Farewell, good luck for the future to come! Excited to see how much more you‚Äôll grow as a producer and the extraordinary stuff you‚Äôll be making on Ableton. I‚Äôll always be mesmerised by how you make those growls. Again, good luck towards you‚Äôre musical goals in the future

Read full topic

item.title: My Goodbyes To You All
item.dc:creator: DJ_La_Rocca
item.description:
I‚Äôm glad to have seen you grow. I hope you Create amazing tracks with ableton, never give up and stick to ur passion.

Also thanks for the mentions?

Read full topic

item.title: My Goodbyes To You All
item.dc:creator: Xiejra
item.description:
So This has been a mixed year. I first found Auxy in July of 2017, I had always wantes to create music but could never afford the software.

I remember this was when I was in Canada with some friends when I found the app and have been writing tracks on it ever since.

As some of you may know I have had bad times throughout the year (as most teenagers do it seems) music has been the perfect escape for me and to that I thank the developers for creating this.

Now i‚Äôm not going to pull a DJ_La_Rocca and write the entire bible as a goodbye so i‚Äôm going to keep it short as to why: This past year has been the perfect start to my music career but now I must say goodbye to the app and it‚Äôs community. All of you are so talented and I really wish everyone the best in your future of music.

I would like to thank: @xavior @HELIXX @anon86704580 @Matik @DJ_La_Rocca @Produk @blackocean @MrSerpent @Phluze @MR_ANDERSON You have all shown so much support to me and I have really enjoyed working alongside all of you. I wish you the best

Now by no means does this mean that I am quitting music, as DJ La Rocca put it ‚ÄúAuxy was limiting‚Äù or something along those lines. That is why I have moved towards Ableton which I am very privileged to have, and I have already started writing tracks on it.

As my final goodbye I have released my ‚Äú8 month in the making album‚Äù, Limitations And A Bad Case Of Perfectionism (Listen here)
https://soundcloud.com/xiejramusic/sets/gtil729x76vx

So then I guess that‚Äôs it from me. Thank you everyone and stay tuned!

~ Elliott Martin (AKA Xiejra)
